product_name: Sea to Summit Aeros Ultralight Pillow
long_description: Very lightweight, compact and comfortable, the Sea to Summit Aeros Ultralight Pillow is the perfect travel companion for those on the move in the mountains or on an airplane. Made from 20-denier laminated polyester to be very light and compact. Durable RF-welded construction; laminated with abrasion-resistant, high-strength thermoplastic urethane. Scalloped bottom edge centers pillow around your shoulders whether you are sleeping on your back, side or upright in a chair. Inflate pillow in just a couple of breaths with the multifunctional valve. Sea to Summit Aeros Ultralight Pillow packs away into a neat, small stuff sack (included).
short_description: Very lightweight, compact and comfortable, the Sea to Summit Aeros Ultralight Pillow is the perfect travel companion for those on the move in the mountains or on an airplane.
